channel.title: Downloading, please help
channel.description: How do i download a server, like on media fire. I want to put the server i have, up onto media fire or mega upload, but i dont know how, or what folders i put in. Do i do the source and client? Please help. :)

item.title: Downloading, please help
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Copy And Paste The Source + Client Into A New Folder, You Can Name It Anything
EXAMPLE MyServerRelease>Source || Client (Put The Files In Seperate Folders With-In The “MyServerRelease” Folder
Highlight Both The Folders (Assuming You Have An Zipping Program, ( Like WinRaR) Right Client The Highlighted Folders And Go "Add To “FileNamesLol?.rar” Then Upload On Uppit << I Think Its The Best Personaly, Then Upload The Files, And Put It In The Server Downloads Section, With The Links And Lots Of Pictures =]

www.uppit.com

Read full topic
